attributes.action: Closure of Schools and colleges until December 2nd 2020.
attributes.background:
I Feel it is useless to have this 'National lockdown' Because covid will spread quick and rapidly through the schools and colleges. 

A temporary closure of education will allow covid cases to stop spreading and for students to work safely and effectively from home.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557012
